body.bibl: Farina, Margherita. “Daniel the Annotator: Notes on Greek, Syriac and Arabic Glosses in the Manuscripts Copied by Daniel of Mardin.” In Syriac Lexis and Lexica: Compiling Ancient and Modern Vocabularies, edited by Mara Nicosia, 143–66.
